sentences: Mark Ware Isham (born September 7, 1951) is an American musician and film composer.
Isham acted as well in Made in Heaven by Alan Rudolph (1987) and directed  The Cowboy and the Ballerina in 1998.
Isham was born in New York City, the son of Patricia (n√©e Hammond), a violinist, and Howard Fuller Isham, a Professor of Humanities.
